resourceTemplates.name: events-in-date-range
resourceTemplates.title: Events in date range
resourceTemplates.description: Get all calendar events between a specific start and end date/time (e.g. 'today', 'next week').

resourceTemplates.name: events-in-date-range-other-user
resourceTemplates.title: Events in date range (other user)
resourceTemplates.description: Get all calendar events for another user between a start and end date/time. Requires delegate rights or access to shared mailbox.

resourceTemplates.name: upcoming-events
resourceTemplates.title: Upcoming events
resourceTemplates.description: Get the next {top} upcoming events from your default calendar.
